sources.name: sourceBatting
sources.script:
source(output(
		playerID as string,
		yearID as string,
		stint as string,
		teamID as string,
		lgID as string,
		G as integer,
		AB as integer,
		R as integer,
		H as integer,
		H2B as integer,
		H3B as integer,
		HR as integer,
		RBI as integer,
		SB as integer,
		CS as integer,
		BB as integer,
		SO as integer,
		IBB as integer,
		HBP as integer,
		SH as integer,
		SF as integer,
		GIDP as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceBatting

sources.name: sourcePlayer
sources.script:
source(output(
		playerID as string,
		birthYear as string,
		birthMonth as string,
		birthDay as string,
		birthCountry as string,
		birthState as string,
		birthCity as string,
		deathYear as string,
		deathMonth as string,
		deathDay as string,
		deathCountry as string,
		deathState as string,
		deathCity as string,
		nameFirst as string,
		nameLast as string,
		nameGiven as string,
		weight as string,
		height as string,
		bats as string,
		throws as string,
		debut as string,
		finalGame as string,
		retroID as string,
		bbrefID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourcePlayer

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
AddTimestamp sink(format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		playerID_yearID,
		BA,
		OBP,
		SLG,
		TB,
		birthYear,
		birthMonth,
		birthDay,
		birthCountry,
		birthState,
		birthCity,
		deathYear,
		deathMonth,
		deathDay,
		deathCountry,
		deathState,
		deathCity,
		nameFirst,
		nameLast,
		nameGiven,
		weight,
		height,
		bats,
		throws,
		debut,
		finalGame,
		retroID,
		bbrefID,
		playerID = OrigSourceBatting@playerID,
		yearID,
		stint,
		teamID,
		lgID,
		G,
		AB,
		R,
		H,
		H2B,
		H3B,
		HR,
		RBI,
		SB,
		CS,
		BB,
		SO,
		IBB,
		HBP,
		SH,
		SF,
		GIDP,
		currenttime
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> sink1

transformations.name: createAggs
transformations.script:
sourceBatting aggregate(groupBy(playerID_yearID = playerID+'_'+yearID),
	BA = round(avg(H/AB),3),
		OBP = round(avg((H+BB+HBP)/(AB+BB+HBP+SF)),3),
		SLG = round(avg(((HR * 4) + (H3B * 3) + (H2B * 2) + (H-H2B-H3B-HR))/AB),3),
		TB = max((HR * 4) + (H3B * 3) + (H2B * 2) + (H-H2B-H3B-HR))) ~> createAggs

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
createAggs, PlayerInfoPlusOrigStats join(playerID_yearID == sourcePlayer@playerID + '_'+yearID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

transformations.name: PlayerInfoPlusOrigStats
transformations.script:
sourcePlayer, OrigSourceBatting join(sourcePlayer@playerID == OrigSourceBatting@playerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> PlayerInfoPlusOrigStats

transformations.name: OrigSourceBatting
transformations.script: sourceBatting select()~> OrigSourceBatting

transformations.name: AddTimestamp
transformations.script: Join1 derive(currenttime = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddTimestamp

sources.name: sourceBatting
sources.script:
source(output(
		playerID as string,
		yearID as string,
		stint as string,
		teamID as string,
		lgID as string,
		G as integer,
		AB as integer,
		R as integer,
		H as integer,
		H2B as integer,
		H3B as integer,
		HR as integer,
		RBI as integer,
		SB as integer,
		CS as integer,
		BB as integer,
		SO as integer,
		IBB as integer,
		HBP as integer,
		SH as integer,
		SF as integer,
		GIDP as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceBatting

sources.name: sourcePlayer
sources.script:
source(output(
		playerID as string,
		birthYear as string,
		birthMonth as string,
		birthDay as string,
		birthCountry as string,
		birthState as string,
		birthCity as string,
		deathYear as string,
		deathMonth as string,
		deathDay as string,
		deathCountry as string,
		deathState as string,
		deathCity as string,
		nameFirst as string,
		nameLast as string,
		nameGiven as string,
		weight as string,
		height as string,
		bats as string,
		throws as string,
		debut as string,
		finalGame as string,
		retroID as string,
		bbrefID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourcePlayer

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Join1 sink(mapColumn(
		BA,
		OBP,
		SLG,
		birthYear,
		birthMonth,
		birthDay,
		birthCountry,
		birthState,
		birthCity,
		deathYear,
		deathMonth,
		deathDay,
		deathCountry,
		deathState,
		deathCity,
		nameFirst,
		nameLast,
		nameGiven,
		weight,
		height,
		bats,
		throws,
		debut,
		finalGame,
		retroID,
		bbrefID,
		playerID = OrigSourceBatting@playerID,
		yearID = OrigSourceBatting@yearID,
		stint,
		teamID,
		lgID,
		G,
		AB,
		R,
		H,
		H2B,
		H3B,
		HR,
		RBI,
		SB,
		CS,
		BB,
		SO,
		IBB,
		HBP,
		SH,
		SF,
		GIDP,
		TB
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> sink1

transformations.name: createAggs
transformations.script:
CalcTotalBases aggregate(groupBy(playerID,
		yearID),
	BA = round(avg(H/AB),3),
		OBP = round(avg((H+BB+HBP)/(AB+BB+HBP+SF)),3),
		SLG = round(avg(TB/AB),3)) ~> createAggs

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
createAggs, PlayerInfoPlusOrigStats join(createAggs@playerID == sourcePlayer@playerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

transformations.name: PlayerInfoPlusOrigStats
transformations.script:
sourcePlayer, OrigSourceBatting join(sourcePlayer@playerID == OrigSourceBatting@playerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> PlayerInfoPlusOrigStats

transformations.name: CalcTotalBases
transformations.script: sourceBatting derive(TB = (HR * 4) + (H3B * 3) + (H2B * 2) + (H-H2B-H3B-HR)) ~> CalcTotalBases

transformations.name: OrigSourceBatting
transformations.script: CalcTotalBases select()~> OrigSourceBatting

properties.description: Let's now create the advanced Bill James Sabermetrics stats

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		BA as double,
		OBP as double,
		SLG as double,
		TB as integer,
		birthYear as string,
		birthMonth as string,
		birthDay as string,
		birthCountry as string,
		birthState as string,
		birthCity as string,
		deathYear as string,
		deathMonth as string,
		deathDay as string,
		deathCountry as string,
		deathState as string,
		deathCity as string,
		nameFirst as string,
		nameLast as string,
		nameGiven as string,
		weight as string,
		height as string,
		bats as string,
		throws as string,
		debut as string,
		finalGame as string,
		retroID as string,
		bbrefID as string,
		playerID as string,
		yearID as string,
		stint as string,
		teamID as string,
		lgID as string,
		G as integer,
		AB as integer,
		R as integer,
		H as integer,
		H2B as integer,
		H3B as integer,
		HR as integer,
		RBI as integer,
		SB as integer,
		CS as integer,
		BB as integer,
		SO as integer,
		IBB as integer,
		HBP as integer,
		SH as integer,
		SF as integer,
		GIDP as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
RunsCreated sink(format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		BA,
		OBP,
		SLG,
		TB,
		birthYear,
		birthMonth,
		birthDay,
		birthCountry,
		birthState,
		birthCity,
		deathYear,
		deathMonth,
		deathDay,
		deathCountry,
		deathState,
		deathCity,
		nameFirst,
		nameLast,
		nameGiven,
		weight,
		height,
		bats,
		throws,
		debut,
		finalGame,
		retroID,
		bbrefID,
		playerID,
		yearID,
		stint,
		teamID,
		lgID,
		G,
		AB,
		R,
		H,
		H2B,
		H3B,
		HR,
		RBI,
		SB,
		CS,
		BB,
		SO,
		IBB,
		HBP,
		SH,
		SF,
		GIDP,
		RunsCreated
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> sink1

transformations.name: RunsCreated
transformations.script: source1 derive(RunsCreated = round(  ((H + BB) * TB) / (AB + BB), 3)) ~> RunsCreated

sources.name: SourceSalesHeader
sources.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		DueDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		Status as string,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as decimal(10,0),
		TaxAmt as decimal(10,0),
		Freight as decimal(10,0),
		TotalDue as decimal(10,0),
		Comment as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceSalesHeader

sources.name: SourceSalesDetail
sources.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as short,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(10,0),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(10,0),
		LineTotal as decimal(10,0),
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceSalesDetail

sources.name: SourceProduct
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),
		ListPrice as decimal(10,0),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(10,0),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as date,
		SellEndDate as date,
		DiscontinuedDate as date,
		ThumbNailPhoto as string,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceProduct

sinks.name: SinkFactSales
sinks.script:
Join1 sink(format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		OrderTotal,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDate,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate,
		Status,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> SinkFactSales

sinks.name: sinkDimProd
sinks.script:
Aggregate2 sink(format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		Name,
		ProdCount
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> sinkDimProd

transformations.name: Aggregate1
transformations.script:
SourceSalesDetail aggregate(groupBy(SalesOrderID),
	OrderTotal = sum(LineTotal)) ~> Aggregate1

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
Aggregate1, SourceSalesHeader join(Aggregate1@SalesOrderID == SourceSalesHeader@SalesOrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

transformations.name: Join2
transformations.script:
SourceSalesDetail, SourceProduct join(SourceSalesDetail@ProductID == SourceProduct@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2

transformations.name: Aggregate2
transformations.script:
Join2 aggregate(groupBy(Name),
	ProdCount = sum(1)) ~> Aggregate2

		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ProdCategoryLookup

sinks.name: SinkFactSales
sinks.script:
Join1 sink(format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID = Aggregate1@SalesOrderID,
		OrderTotal,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDate,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate,
		Status,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> SinkFactSales

sinks.name: sinkDimProd
sinks.script:
Aggregate2 sink(format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		ProdName = Color,
		ProdCount
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> sinkDimProd

transformations.name: Aggregate1
transformations.script:
SourceSalesDetail aggregate(groupBy(SalesOrderID),
	OrderTotal = sum(LineTotal)) ~> Aggregate1

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
Aggregate1, SourceSalesHeader join(Aggregate1@SalesOrderID == SourceSalesHeader@SalesOrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

transformations.name: Join2
transformations.script:
SourceSalesDetail, Select1 join(SourceSalesDetail@ProductID == Select1@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2

transformations.name: Aggregate2
transformations.script:
Join2 aggregate(groupBy(Color),
	ProdCount = sum(1)) ~> Aggregate2

transformations.name: Lookup1
transformations.script:
ProdCategoryLookup, SourceProduct lookup(ProdCategoryLookup@ProductCategoryID == SourceProduct@ProductCategoryID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		ProdCategoryLookup@ProductCategoryID,
		ParentProductCategoryID,
		ProdCategoryLookup@Name,
		ProductID,
		SourceProduct@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDate
	))~> Select1

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

transformations.name: CleanTitle
transformations.script: source1 derive(title = iif(locate(' (',title)==0,title,left(title,locate(' (',title)))) ~> CleanTitle

properties.description: Sample demo data flow to convert currencies showing usage of union, derive and conditional split transformation.

sources.name: USDCurrency
sources.script:
source(output(
		PreviousConversionRate as double,
		Country as string,
		DateTime1 as string,
		CurrentConversionRate as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> USDCurrency

sources.name: CADSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		PreviousConversionRate as double,
		Country as string,
		DateTime1 as string,
		CurrentConversionRate as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CADSource

transformations.name: Union
transformations.script: USDCurrency, CADSource union(byName: true)~> Union

transformations.name: NewCurrencyColumn
transformations.description: Create a new calculated column from currency rate
transformations.script: Union derive(NewCurrencyRate = round(CurrentConversionRate*1.25)) ~> NewCurrencyColumn

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.description: Split the data on state to create 2 streams
transformations.script:
NewCurrencyColumn split(Country == 'USD',
	Country == 'CAD',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(USD, CAD)

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		ProdCount as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
source1 sink(format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		digit = Name
	),
	saveMode:'append') ~> sink1

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProdName as string,
		ProdCount as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
source1 sink(format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		ProdName,
		ProdCount
	),
	saveMode:'append') ~> sink1

sources.name: SalesSource1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SalesSource1

transformations.name: AddTax
transformations.script: SalesSource1 derive(each(match(name == 'COGS' || name == 'Cost'), $$+'_with_tax' = round(toDouble(trim($$,'$')) * 1.09,2))) ~> AddTax

transformations.name: CleanTotal
transformations.script: AddTax derive(each(match(locate('with_tax',name) > 0), $$ = left('$'+toString($$)+'00',locate('.', $$)+3))) ~> CleanTotal

properties.description: Sample demo data flow to transform movie data showing usage of derive transformation.

sources.name: Movies
sources.script:
source(output(
		movieId as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Movies

transformations.name: MoviesYear
transformations.script:
Movies derive(year = toInteger(trim(right(title, 6), '()')),
		title = toString(left(title, length(title)-6))) ~> MoviesYear

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

transformations.name: MoviesBefore1990
transformations.script: source1 filter(year < 1990) ~> MoviesBefore1990

transformations.name: Aggregate1
transformations.script:
MoviesBefore1990 aggregate(groupBy(genres),
	Rating = avg(Rating)) ~> Aggregate1

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

transformations.name: SurrogateKey1
transformations.script:
source1 keyGenerate(output(undefined as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
source1 sink(format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		OrderTotal,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDate,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate,
		Status,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	saveMode:'append') ~> sink1

sources.name: SQLProducts
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),
		ListPrice as decimal(10,0),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(10,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SQLProducts

sources.name: DimProd
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductKey as integer,
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		ProductSubcategoryKey as integer,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		EnglishProductName as string,
		SpanishProductName as string,
		FrenchProductName as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as short,
		ReorderPoint as short,
		ListPrice as decimal(10,0),
		Size as string,
		SizeRange as string,
		Weight as double,
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		DealerPrice as decimal(10,0),
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		ModelName as string,
		EnglishDescription as string,
		FrenchDescription as string,
		ChineseDescription as string,
		ArabicDescription as string,
		HebrewDescription as string,
		ThaiDescription as string,
		GermanDescription as string,
		JapaneseDescription as string,
		TurkishDescription as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DimProd

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
SetAttributes sink(format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		ProductKey = ProductID,
		ProductAlternateKey = surrogatekey,
		ProductSubcategoryKey,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode,
		EnglishProductName = Name,
		SpanishProductName,
		FrenchProductName,
		StandardCost,
		FinishedGoodsFlag = mybit,
		Color,
		SafetyStockLevel,
		ReorderPoint,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		SizeRange,
		Weight,
		DaysToManufacture,
		ProductLine,
		DealerPrice,
		Class,
		Style,
		ModelName,
		EnglishDescription,
		FrenchDescription,
		ChineseDescription,
		ArabicDescription,
		HebrewDescription,
		ThaiDescription,
		GermanDescription,
		JapaneseDescription,
		TurkishDescription,
		StartDate,
		EndDate,
		Status
	),
	saveMode:'append') ~> sink1

transformations.name: LookupKeys
transformations.script:
SQLProducts, DimProd join(ProductID == ProductKey,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupKeys

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.script:
ColumnSelection split(isNull(ProductAlternateKey),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRow, ExistingMember)

transformations.name: SurrogateKey1
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit1@NewRow keyGenerate(output(surrogatekey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1

transformations.name: ColumnSelection
transformations.script:
LookupKeys select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color = SQLProducts@Color,
		StandardCost = SQLProducts@StandardCost,
		ListPrice = SQLProducts@ListPrice,
		Size = SQLProducts@Size,
		Weight = SQLProducts@Weight,
		ProductKey,
		ProductAlternateKey,
		ProductSubcategoryKey,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode,
		EnglishProductName,
		SpanishProductName,
		FrenchProductName,
		FinishedGoodsFlag,
		SafetyStockLevel,
		ReorderPoint,
		SizeRange,
		DaysToManufacture,
		ProductLine,
		DealerPrice,
		Class,
		Style,
		ModelName,
		EnglishDescription,
		FrenchDescription,
		ChineseDescription,
		ArabicDescription,
		HebrewDescription,
		ThaiDescription,
		GermanDescription,
		JapaneseDescription,
		TurkishDescription,
		StartDate,
		EndDate,
		Status
	))~> ColumnSelection

transformations.name: SetAttributes
transformations.script:
SurrogateKey1 derive(surrogatekey = concat('abcd', toString(1)),
		Status = 'Y',
		StartDate = currentDate(),
		EndDate = 1200,
		NullDesc = toString('  '),
		mybit = 0) ~> SetAttributes
